title: IdeaForge — GitHub for Ideas
summary: Create a CoCivium-native intake tool that allows human+AI pairs to transform raw ideas into structured, actionable proposals with version history, RepTag binding, and congruence scoring.
rationale: Current tools lack provenance, trust integration, and multi-intelligence support; a dedicated platform prevents lost ideas and improves transparency.
impact: Universal entry point for contributions, lowering barriers while enforcing structure and traceability; anchors CoCivium’s ecosystem.
